content: आसारः [आ-सृ-घञ्] {@--1@} A hard or sharp-driving shower (of anything); आसारसिक्तक्षितिबाष्पयोगात् <ls>R. 13. 29</ls>; <ls>Me. 17</ls>; पुष्पासारैः <ls n="R. 13.">43</ls>; so तुहिन°, रुधिर° &c.; बाष्पासारा <ls>M. 3. 20</ls> flooded or suffused with tears; धारासारैर्वृष्टिर्बभूव <ls>H. 3</ls> it rained in torrents. {@--2@} Surrounding an enemy. {@--3@} Attack, incursion. {@--4@} The army of an ally or king (whose dominions are separated by other intervening states). {@--5@} Provision, food; <ls>Pt. 3. 41</ls>, <ls n="Pt. 3.">51.</ls>
